name: MEC Large Recycled Duffle Bag - Unisex
description:
For getting there with your gear. This duffel does what duffels do best – haul mountains of gear to basecamps, hostels and university dorms. It's got the usual bomber construction, with bonus shoulder straps that you can hide away when you're not using them.Durable 1000-denier high tenacity recycled polyester fabric with heavy duty stitching.PU coating on the interior adds water resistance to the fabric.Converts into a backpack with zip-away shoulder straps.Removable shoulder strap is adjustable with a sliding shoulder pad.Loads of carry points include a Velcro® wrap handle and burly grab handles at each end.2-way Vislon coiled zipper can be secured with a travel lock.Zippered external pocket is perfect for small items.Packs into its own pocket (which then doubles as an internal storage pocket).

        Sustainability
